#summary SocialConnect implementation example.

= Introduction =

[http://yasn.socialconnect.in Yet Another Social Network (YASN)] is a simple social platform using SocialConnect to communicate with Facebook and OpenSocial. It's packaged with SocialConnect and presented as a example of what SocialConnect can add to a social platform.
